summary: A Telvanni Tower Mushroom home build next to Tel Mithryn for those that like to play as a Telvanni wizard. REQUIRES DAWNGUARD, DRAGONBORN AND HEARTFIRE.
descriptionHtml:
A Telvanni Tower Mushroom home build next to Tel Mithryn for those that like to play as a Telvanni wizard. REQUIRES DAWNGUARD, DRAGONBORN AND HEARTFIRE. 

THE HOUSE IS LOCATED NEXT TO TEL MITHRYN SO FASTRAVEL TO THERE.

The First time I saw the Giant Mushroom with the amazing float up spell, I really liked to create one myself, after months of the Dragonborn released I finally decided to do it. I am satisfied with the way it look now, but I am open for requests if they fit my vision upon the home.  The home itself have a large laboratory and holds everything a player should need. I decided to not add mannequins as they bug as hell, but I might give it another shot soon. 

The House:
Kitchen
Bedroom
Alchemy labs
Enchanting labs
Staff enchanter
Living room
Vault
Garden

Spider scroll maker ( NOT WORKING!)  I really am trying to figure it out, if anyone knows how to get it to work let me know!!.

There should be enough storage,  All chests, satchels etc are safe and empty.
Weapon racks
Weapon Display Cases
Dagger Display case

There also is a small mushroom house next to it with:

Tanning rack,
Forge
Workbench
Smelter
Storage

You are able to fast travel to here with using the black book on the office table next to all the maps.

I really hope you like it!

Please report bugs if any.
author: MrKoekie
